transcript: thanks to his method did he succeed For a long time I haven't said anything, I wrote down on a notebook the business activities every day, Saturday night I didn't meet anyone to kill myself, I went to dinner, then I checked the exam in my office, the notebook I kept thinking about a story every time I brushed my teeth, every negotiation, every bribery during that week I  wondering where I made a mistake that time, did I act skillfully, where could I have been more skillful,
